description: Welcome to PARKWAY! With an impressive 1870sqft, this 3 bed/3 bath townhouse truly feels like a spacious home. Its south-facing corner location captures an abundance of natural light throughout the day allowing the convenient deck off the kitchen to soak up the sun. The main floor also provides a powder room & expansive rooms for gatherings. The lower level offers flexible bonus space for a teenager/student retreat; home office; gym or games room. Parkway is a well managed, low maintenance complex located just a short stroll to Sunnyside Park, a neighborhood Park known for its outdoor pool, playgrounds & baseball diamonds. Moments from shopping & dining at Southpoint Exchange & Grandview Corners - experience comfort, quality construction & everyday convenience in the heart of South Surrey.
